title: Flutter Developer (Contract Based)

title: Mobile Developer (Flutter)
description: Join us (a Generative AI mobile startup for memories 🧠) as our Mobile Developer (Flutter)!About Us 🚀:We are a stealth startup with seed funding. Our mission is to help people remember and honor their loved ones. We know this problem very well and have extensive research that shows this is an unserved need that needs solving. We are led by an experienced founder whose startup was previously backed by Y Combinator and top global and regional investors. The founder has built a company from 0 to 1.Role Overview ⛰️:As a Mobile Developer, you will be a pioneer, driving the development of our web applications from the ground up. You will have the unique opportunity to shape the technical direction of the company, work closely with the founding team, and see the direct impact of your work on our growth.Why Join Us 👏:Innovation-Driven Culture: Join a team that thrives on innovation and embraces creative problem-solving. We foster an environment where your ideas will be valued, and you'll have the opportunity to make a real impact.Professional Growth: We are committed to your professional development. Grow your career with access to mentorship, training, and opportunities to expand your skill set while working on projects that matter.Impactful Work: Be part of projects that have a meaningful impact to help people remember and honor their loved ones, and your work will directly contribute to them.Flexible Work Environment: We understand the importance of work-life balance. Enjoy a flexible work environment that accommodates your needs and allows you to excel in your role.Competitive Compensation: Receive a competitive salary and performance-based bonuses, recognizing your hard work and contributions.Collaborative Team: Join a diverse and collaborative team where teamwork and open communication are encouraged. You'll be working alongside talented individuals who are passionate about what they do.Cutting-Edge Tech: Stay at the forefront of technology trends and work with the latest tools and frameworks. You'll have access to top-notch resources to help you excel in your role.Inclusive Environment: We value diversity and inclusion. We believe that a diverse team brings different perspectives and ideas, leading to better solutions and a more enriching work environment.Key Responsibilities 📝:Collaborate with the product and design teams to translate concepts into user-friendly mobile applications.Develop, test, and maintain high-quality code in Flutter.Implement 3D experiences using Unity, enhancing user engagement and interactivity.Optimize mobile applications for performance, speed, and responsiveness.Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to drive innovation.Troubleshoot and debug mobile applications, addressing any technical issues.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of features and functionalities.Qualifications 🥽:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.3-6 years of professional experience in mobile application development.Strong proficiency in Flutter, with a demonstrable portfolio of mobile apps.Exposure to Unity and 3D development is a plus.Solid understanding of mobile application architecture, design patterns, and best practices.Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and continuous integration tools.Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.Strong communication and teamwork skills.Self-motivated and capable of working in a dynamic startup environment.Perks and Benefits 🧘‍♀️:Do something that you care about and work with people that you like.Work in a company where your contribution is immediately visible and tangible.Remote or in-office; up to you. It is up to you to choose where you are the most productive and enjoy working.Uninterrupted, long hours of focus time. Developers benefit from long stretches of time where they can focus. Meetings will be at a minimum and kept to specific days. Asynchronous communication is also an option.Application Process 🔥:We look forward to reviewing your application. Join us to help people cherish and remember their most important memories!

title: Flutter Mobile Developer
description: We are seeking an experienced Flutter Mobile Developer to join our team and help us build exciting and user-friendly mobile applications for our customers. You will become an integral part of our software team and be responsible for developing high-quality, efficient, and visually stunning mobile applications using the Flutter framework.Responsibilities:Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including product managers and UI/X designers, to define ION Mobility app requirements and specifications. Designing and developing user interfaces that provide an exceptional user experience. Writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code in Dart language. Implementing and integrating RESTful APIs and third-party libraries. Troubleshooting, debugging, and optimizing mobile applications for performance. Keeping up-to-date with the latest Flutter and mobile development trends and technologies. Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience). Proven experience developing mobile applications with Flutter. Strong knowledge of Dart programming language. Familiarity with RESTful APIs and mobile app architecture patterns. Proficiency in version control systems (e.g., Git). Solid understanding of the mobile app development lifecycle. Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills. Strong communication and teamwork skills. Ability to work independently in a fast-paced, collaborative environment. Knowledge of Android and iOS app deployment processes is a plus. Familiar with CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) processes and tools. Experience and knowledge of IoT (Internet of Things) and/or IoV (Internet of Vehicles) technologies is a plus. About ION MobilityWe are pushing the frontiers of what is possible by developing desirable products as clean alternatives for urban users, to alleviate urban air pollution, and to lead the inevitable transition to EVs across Southeast Asia. Our team is constantly pushing the boundaries of innovation and design to create an electric riding experience that doesn't compromise on quality or style.Join the team to bring about the future of mobility with us today!

The candidate should also have a good understanding of AI concepts and how to integrate them into mobile applications. As a member of our team, you will work on exciting projects and contribute to the development of AI-powered mobile applications.ResponsibilitiesDesign and build advanced applications for the mobile platform.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.Work with outside data sources and APIs.Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.Maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.Implement AI functionalities in our mobile applications as per requirements.QualificationsA Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.More than four years of working experience preferred. Still fresh graduates or junior developers are welcome.Proven experience in mobile app development and proficiency with Flutter, Dart, or React Native.Some experience with AI, machine learning, and data analytics.Knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies.Knowledge of Backend-as-a-Service, e.g. Firebase/SupabaseSolid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.Experience with performance and memory tuning tools.Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.What we offerCompetitive salary and benefits.A creative and collaborative work environment.Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies.Continuous learning and professional growth opportunities.If you’re passionate about mobile technology and excited about the prospect of working on innovative AI applications, then we’d love to hear from you.Interested applicants are invited to submit their resume to general@aail.ai. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Applied Artificial Intelligence Laboratory is an equal opportunity employer.
